itemDescription: British Army officer killed in action the day before the 1815 Battle of Waterloo

wikipedia_page.main: Major Edward Hodge (1782 – 17 June 1815) was a British Army officer killed in action the day before the 1815 Battle of Waterloo.

response: Hodge was the son of Major Edward Hodge (1782–1815) of the 7th Hussars, who distinguished himself in the Peninsula War and in the Waterloo Campaign.
